function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to clinical psychotherapists for marginalized populations","Impact":"Delayed detection of warning signs and psychological crises","Mitigation":"Expand telemedicine services and community-based strategies for support","Technologies":"Telemedicine technologies, remote monitoring tools","People":"Elderly individuals, individuals with psychological problems","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate social support for isolated individuals during COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health consequences and lack of support for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Deliver targeted, tailored messages and provide adequate social support","Technologies":"Telecommunication technologies, remote messaging platforms","People":"Infected patients, quarantined individuals, medical professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Lack of mental health strategies in pandemic areas","Impact":"Difficulty in facilitating lifestyle changes and re-adaptation activities for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Implement mental health supporting strategies and community-based interventions","Technologies":"Remote counseling platforms, mental health apps","People":"Vulnerable populations in pandemic areas","Owner":"Community organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
